alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth; Lincoln; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:53PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lincoln, northeastern Ellsworth and western Saline Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 453 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brookville, or 13 miles west of Salina, moving east at 30 mph. A mesonet site at Lincoln Hill reported a wind gust to 51 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Mesonet. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salina, Assaria, Brookville, Smolan, Falun, Glendale, Westfall and Salina Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 77 and 95. Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 226 and 258. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
